title: Side mouse buttons not working?
body: So, I recently purchased a Gamdias Zeus e1 mouse with 2 side buttons, and played a custom game with my friend to test it out. One of the first things I noticed was the fact that neither of the side buttons, reading as Mouse4 and Mouse5, worked for my summoner spells except when I was dead, or very soon after respawning. Before, I was using an old Microsoft mouse with one button on the side, reading as Mouse5. It worked just fine, and I never had any problems with summoner spells not working. I have used my new mouse in a variety of other games, such as Minecraft, Bioshock Infinite, Garry's Mod, Portal 2, and others, and I have not noticed any problems with the side mouse buttons. Does anyone know what is causing this, and possibly how to fix it? Any feedback would be appreciated. Thanks!

This worked for me!  I also had issues after updating Windows 10.  If you are having issues, try this fix.  Device Manager showed that I had 2 mice installed on my desktop (when I only have one).  I disabled one and it disabled my mouse, which I re-enabled using the keyboard.  Disabling the other mouse still allowed my mouse to work and my side buttons to work properly in League of Legends.  Thanks Smoky SwaG!

How have you configured these buttons for League? Did you configure them inside League itself, through the game's files, or from a third-party program specifically for the mouse?
I bound them in the client before game, as well as in the game's options menu.
Is there anything I can do?

I'd recommend you're launching League as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) and make sure there are no background applications interfering with your mouse by [**completing a clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3).

Let me know if this caused any change.

Ok, did a clean boot, launched the client as admin, and still experiencing the same issue. Summoner spells only seem to stop working about 5 minutes after I respawn, and don't work again until I die. Any other suggestions? (Again, it is not the mouse. I have tested it in a variety of other games)

Since this wasn't changed by any third-party background apps, we'll try one last thing: A clean reset of your configuration file that stores your mouse settings in-game.

First, I'd like you to **log into League** then navigate to your config folder, which should be in the following directory:

> **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

Delete these two files:
**- input.ini
- PersistedSettings.json**

Once you've deleted these two files, hop into a custom match to confirm your settings are all set to default, then configure your side mouse buttons. Let me know if this resolved your issue.
Should I just install one of those programs to re map my mouse buttons to unused keys on my keyboard? I seem to have a lot of those, anyways.

There may be something off in your game files somewhere. but we'll need to put you in touch with one of our tech specialists to check that. I recommend running some system logs with our [**HRT Application**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) before attaching them to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Let me know if you run into any troubles completing that.
